test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:task (pickup X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X green) (sort Y microwave)))) (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X white)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X black) (sort Y microwave)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X green) (sort Y closet)))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y teapoy))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X yellow) (sort Y plant))) )
test.nl: Do not pick up the black book in microwave. Do not pick up the white bottle. The black remotecontrol must in the microwave. There must be a green bottle in closet. Close the microwave. Put a bottle in microwave. Put a remotecontrol on the teapoy. Put a yellow can on the plant.
